ProjectTitle: The role of mechanical loading in cartilage homeostasis, degeneration and repair: A multi-scale approach

4. Metadata: are you using the DICOM standard for MRI? 
6. Preservation: please note that UZL ethical committee recommends to store the data related to clinical studies for 25 years
7. Sharing: for data sharing you can also use KU Leuven RDR, if needed you can apply an embargo or restricted access and others can request access via the repository (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
label: good with suggestions
